sections.heading: Wagering percentage to permittee and state; exemptions5-111
sections.text: Wagering percentage to permittee and state; exemptionsA. The commission shall prescribe rules governing wagering on races under the system known as pari-mutuel wagering. Wagering shall be conducted by a permittee only by pari-mutuel wagerin
